system.description:
You are a true creature of the wilderness, fast, ferocious, and lethal. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Dexterity, or Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your berserker levels count as ranger levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.q1v63h8j4a87n3t0]{Extra Attack} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.n83irh1dygryy7q8]{Stride and Seek} features.
  • Your speed increases by 5 feet.
  • While you are raging, the bonus to attack from @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.yuncbhlz6js1w4t4]{Hunter's Target} increases to +2 and the bonus damage increases to 1d8.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in berserker, 3 levels in ranger
